item.title: Dynasty Warriors: Origins major DLC ‚ÄòVisions of Four Heroes‚Äô pre-orders now available

Pre-orders for Dynasty Warriors: Origins‚Äò major downloadable content ‚ÄúVisions of Four Heroes‚Äù are now available for $34.99 / ¬£28.99 / ‚Ç¨34.99 / ¬•4,840, publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Omega Force announced. As previously announced, it will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam on January 22, 2026, alongside the base game‚Äôs launch on Switch 2.

Get the latest details below:

‚ÄúVisions of Four Heroes‚Äù features brand-new stories centered around four heroes whose stories were not explored in Dynasty Warriors: Origins‚ÄîZhang Jiao, Dong Zhuo, Yuan Shao, and Lu Bu. These stories are explored as ‚ÄúWhat If‚Äù scenarios and will allow players to discover new sides to these legendary heroes. New companions are also featured in the major downloadable content including Zhuhe, a Guardian of Peace; Diaochan, a beautiful warrior and a familiar fan favorite; and a mysterious new officer who will be revealed as the story unfolds.

Fans will also be able to enjoy new weapons‚Äîthe ‚ÄúBow‚Äù and ‚ÄúRope Dart‚Äù‚Äîto further enhance the exhilarating action of one-versus-1,000 warfare by leveraging each weapon‚Äôs unique characteristics on the battlefield. Existing weapons will also receive an update, granting new arts, skill panels, as well as an increase in the trait level cap. Finally, a new ‚ÄúTraining Ground‚Äù mode will be included, where players battle formidable foes while practicing their skills.

For a limited time, anyone who pre-orders ‚ÄúVisions of Four Heroes‚Äù will receive an exclusive outfit for the protagonist, the ‚ÄúYellow Turban Attire.‚Äù Designed to embody the heroic spirit of Dynasty Warriors: Origins, this costume lets players take to the battlefield clad in the symbolic garb of the Yellow Turban Rebellion.

item.title: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined details adult Kiefer storyline, stone tablet fragments
item.content:encoded:

Meet Kiefer as an adult and fight alongside him.

Square Enix has released a new trailer, information, and screenshots for Dragon Quest VII Reimagined introducing a new storyline featuring Kiefer as an adult, as well as the fragments of broken stone tablets players must collect to expand the world.

Get the details below.

‚ñ† Discover a New Storyline Featuring Kiefer as an Adult!

Dragon Quest VII Reimagined is set to launch globally on Thursday, February 5, 2026. While the core elements from the original game remain, other aspects have been reimagined for more streamlined progression and fuller character development. The game also features new storylines, including one where you meet Kiefer as an adult and fight alongside him!

‚ÄîAs the protagonist continues his adventure in the Rucker region of the past, he meets his best friend, Kiefer, looking decidely older!

‚ÄîThe party sneaks into Rucker Castle at night, to help solve Kiefer‚Äôs troubles. Just don‚Äôt let the guards spot you!

‚ÄîKiefer has honed his skills considerably and will support you in battle with items and powerful abilities. Perhaps there‚Äôll be opportunities to fight together again beyond the Rucker region‚Ä¶

‚ñ† Collect Fragments to Complete the Stone Tablets and Keep Expanding the World!

In Dragon Quest VII Reimagined, you must collect the fragments of broken stone tablets, then fit them all back together like a puzzle to open up new locations to visit. These new areas all have their own problems, and solving them will cause those locations to appear in the protagonist‚Äôs world, adding to the places you can explore. Seek out the stone tablet fragments scattered across the land and keep expanding the world!

‚ÄîThe shrine on the island where the protagonists live has multiple pedestals. Place the stone tablet fragments onto pedestals of the same color.

‚ÄîOnce complete, each stone tablet leads to a different location with its own set of problems to solve.

‚ÄîStone tablet fragments can be found in towns and dungeons or obtained by defeating powerful enemies.

‚ÄîSolving the problem at the stone tablet‚Äôs destination triggers a chain reaction, causing changes in the protagonists‚Äô world, like new islands that appear as if from nowhere!

‚Üì

The Caretaker (voiced by Emma Stannard in English)

A mystical fairy encountered in the pedestal room of the Shrine of Mysteries. They‚Äôre said to have the duty of guiding the Chosen Ones to a new world.

Dragon Quest VII Reimagined is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on February 5, 2026 worldwide. Read more about the game here and here.

item.title: FATAL FRAME II: Crimson Butterfly REMAKE launches March 12, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Digital Deluxe Edition and pre-order bonuses detailed.

Horror adventure game remake FATAL FRAME II: Crimson Butterfly REMAKE will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steamon March 12, 2026, publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Team NINJA announced.

In addition to the standard edition, a Digital Deluxe Edition will also be available, which includes the base game, a digital soundtrack, and a digital art book, as well as the ‚ÄúDigital Deluxe Bonus Set‚Äù featuring a Deluxe Charm, Lace Gloves (Black), Lace Gloves (White), Japanese Gothic (Right Wing), and Japanese Gothic (Left Wing).

Early purchases include the ‚ÄúEarly Purchase Bonus Set‚Äù featuring a Wraith Charm, Peony Hair Ornament (Red), Peony Hair Ornament (Blue), Kimono (Black), and Kimono (Red).

Pre-orders include the ‚ÄúPre-Order Bonus Set‚Äù featuring a Spirit Charm, Cat Ears (Black), Cat Ears (White), Crimson Butterfly ‚Äì Mayu (Original), and Crimson Butterfly ‚Äì Mio (Original).

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ

Get the latest details below.

FATAL FRAME II: Crimson Butterfly REMAKE is a full remake of the second installment in the FATAL FRAME (PROJECT ZERO) series, originally released in 2003. The title has undergone a complete overhaul to offer a haunting experience, which has been beautifully reborn thanks to enhanced graphics, sound and controls elements.

The graphical enhancements offer a higher level of detail with refined textures, striking lighting and shadow contrast, generating a more haunting and realistic atmosphere than ever before. The sound has been revamped to offer spatial audio that will immerse players deep into the action, allowing them to enjoy a more authentic experience. Not only will they hear and feel the presence of spirits more intensely, but wraiths will appear when least expected, such as trying to grab the protagonist‚Äôs hands when reaching for an item or waiting in the shadows. Players will have to react quickly to escape these attacks. Failure to do so will inflict Willpower Damage, leading directly to intense combat.

The gameplay mechanics of the Camera Obscura, a signature feature of the FATAL FRAME franchise, have also been reworked to offer a more intense and rich experience during combat and exploration. Players will still be able to attack wraiths by taking photos, but managing to align the focus point with their target will inflict more damage. If the damage dealt exceeds a certain threshold, players will be able to activate Shutter Chance state, where they will then be able to deal significant damage with one single picture within a brief period‚Äîmaking it crucial for fans to be precise and to perfectly time their shot.

Players will be able to trigger a Fatal Frame by taking a shot at the perfect moment, which will interrupt and stun their opponent. If fans manage to trigger a Fatal Frame during a Shutter Chance state, they will activate a Fatal Time, a limited window that will allow them to take several shots in quick succession to inflict significant damage.

To confront the spirits lurking in the shadows of Minakami Village, players will be able to rely on new Camera Obscura features such as focus, zoom and filters. By lighting up the focus points on the screen, players will focus on their target and deal more damage to the spirits if they manage to light more focus points. By using the zoom feature, players will be able to attack a spirit from a distance while taking cover and being undetected and will also be able to attack multiple targets at once by zooming out. The zoom of the Camera Obscura will also help players during exploration as they will be able to photograph specific objects.

Lastly, the filters will help players to unravel the mysteries around them by changing filters depending on the situation or wraith they encounter. Among the different filters they can use, the Paraceptual Filter will allow them to increase their shooting distance in combat and, when exploring, to reproduce past actions using the residual memories.

In addition to these new mechanics, FATAL FRAME II: Crimson Butterfly REMAKE will introduce new gameplay features, such as being able to hold Mayu‚Äôs hand, which will recover players‚Äô Health and Willpower. However, if Mayu is in danger, she may stumble and fall, requiring Mio‚Äôs help to get back up. Players will also be able to collect Charms they can equip, allowing them to benefit from various effects. By expanding the Charm Bag, the number of charms they can equip will increase.

The next standalone chapter in the Coffee Talk series.

Coffee Talk Tokyo will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam on March 5, 2026, publisher and developer Chorus Worldwide, and developer Toge Productions announced.

A Collector‚Äôs Edition will also be available, which includes a 10-track ‚ÄúCity Pop Album,‚Äù the ‚ÄúSeattle Prologue Chapter,‚Äù and an in-game digital art book.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Set in a late-night cafe in Tokyo, Coffee Talk Tokyo invites players to step into the role of the barista, brewing drinks that warm the hearts of humans and fantastical beings alike. Each cup influences the tone of every conversation, revealing the stories, dreams, and struggles of a completely new cast of characters.

Players can experiment with both hot and cold drinks, enhance their latte art with sprinkle stencils, and explore Tomodachill, an in-game social feed that unlocks hidden insights into their customers‚Äô lives.

The experience is wrapped in a chill lo-fi soundtrack by Andrew ‚ÄúAJ‚Äù Jeremy, returning composer from Coffee Talk and Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly, blending calm jazz and soft beats inspired by Tokyo‚Äôs summer nights.

Key Features

  • New Cafe, New Stories ‚Äì Meet an all-new cast of characters in a reimagined setting inspired by Tokyo‚Äôs nightscape.
  • Serve and Connect ‚Äì Craft drinks that shape conversations and influence branching storylines.
  • Enhanced Creativity ‚Äì Master new latte art tools, including sprinkle stencils for personalized designs.
  • Tomodachill Social Feed ‚Äì Discover clues and connections that reveal new dialogue options.
  • Lo-Fi Soundtrack by Andrew ‚ÄúAJ‚Äù Jeremy ‚Äì A fresh collection of relaxing tracks capturing the rhythm of city life.
  • Full Localization ‚Äì Available in nine languages: English, Japanese, Brazilian Portuguese, Korean, French, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese.

item.title: inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories. launches in April 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Simulation game centered around a small-town convenience store in the 1990s.

inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories., a slice-of-life narrative-driven simulation game set in a small-town convenience store in early 1990s Japan, will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC and Mac via Steam in April 2026, publisher Beep Japan and developer Nagai Industries announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a slice-of-life narrative-driven simulation game centered around a small-town convenience store in the early 1990s. Shelve goods, engage in meaningful conversations with your customers, and explore the ways you can impact their lives with your decisions.

Discover joy and wonder hidden behind the daily routine of a konbini worker, engage in meaningful conversations with a diverse cast of characters, and see how their stories intertwine in a beautifully-rendered early 1990s Japan.

inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a meditative third-person single-player experience that puts you in the shoes of Makoto Hayakawa, a college student taking a break from her studies to help her aunt at the small and cozy convenience store.

Over the course of the game, you‚Äôre going to establish your own ways of managing the store and see how your day-to-day decisions affect the lives of your customers.

You will learn their buying habits and develop a unique approach to each one of them in order to make their experience at the store smooth and pleasant.

strong>Key Features

  • A relaxing, narrative-driven experience focused on character stories and dialogue interaction;
  • A diverse cast of characters with their own distinct personalities, buying habits, and little quirks that make each encounter memorable;
  • A variety of accessible mini-games, carefully recreating a store clerk‚Äôs daily routine (restock products, make phone calls, scan goods, and checkout your customers);
  • An authentic, beautifully-rendered konbini with a nostalgic feel of the early 1990s;
  • A branching storyline with multiple dialogue options, offering deep conversational experience;
  • An ASMR sound designed to compliment your playtime with sensations of calm and solace.

Spike Chunsoft will release No Sleep For Kaname Date ‚Äì From AI: The Somnium Files for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PlayStation 4 on February 26, 2026 for $39.99, the company announced.

A physical edition will be available for PlayStation 5 in $39.99 standard and $64.99 ‚ÄúTote Bag Bundle‚Äù editions, while the Xbox Series and PlayStation 4 versions will be digital-only.

No Sleep For Kaname Date ‚Äì From AI: The Somnium Files first launched for Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam on July 25.

Here is an overview of the game, via Spike Chunsoft:

About

The player takes on the role of Kaname Date, the protagonist, and once again teams up with the AI-Ball, Aiba, to tackle a mysterious case and rescue Iris, an internet idol who has been forced to take part in a dangerous escape game. No Sleep For Kaname Date ‚Äì From AI: The Somnium Files introduces a new gameplay element: ‚ÄúEscape.‚Äù As with previous games, in ‚ÄúInvestigation,‚Äù players will examine crime scenes and listen to testimonies. In ‚ÄúSomnium,‚Äù players enter the dream worlds of suspects and key witnesses. In the new ‚ÄúEscape‚Äù sections, players will solve puzzles to break out of locked rooms. By moving between these three sections, players can obtain the necessary clues to solve the case.

Story Summary

After The New Cyclops Serial Killings was resolved, internet idol Iris Sagan (known as ‚ÄúA-set‚Äù) is abducted by a UFO and forced to participate in a perilous escape game called The Third Eye Game. Meanwhile, in another part of the city, a mysterious device is discovered. It resembles a coffin, and attached to it is a note that reads:

‚ÄúPsync me.‚Äù

Relying on a tenuous line of communication with the missing Iris, one man rises once again, determined to track down the UFO that should not even exist. Together with his partner, the AI-Ball Aiba, he sets out on a quest. That man‚Ä¶is Special Agent Kaname Date
